name: tm87
effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Swagger to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
The user enrages the foe into
confusion. However, it also sharply
raises the foe’s Attack stat.

flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:

user’s HP is restored by over half of the damage
taken by the target.
